subject: Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
Dogs
Psychics and Psychic Phenomena
Pets
lead_paragraph: Vivi the whippet, the prize-winning show dog who vanished two years ago at Kennedy International Airport, is alive and well. At least that’s what the animal psychics say.
snippet: Vivi the whippet, the prize-winning show dog who vanished two years ago at Kennedy International Airport, is alive and well. At least that’s what the animal psychics say.
